mapper.select: select * from nx_community_goods as cg left join nx_community_standard as ds on ds.nx_CS_comm_goods_id = cg.nx_community_goods_id left join nx_community_card as ncc on ncc.nx_community_card_id = cg.nx_cg_card_id where nx_community_goods_id = #{value}

select * from nx_community_goods where nx_cg_community_id = #{nxCgCommunityId} and nx_cg_goods_type = 2 and (nx_cg_goods_pinyin like concat('%', #{pinyin}, '%') or nx_cg_goods_py like concat('%', #{pinyin}, '%'))

select * from nx_community_goods as cg left join nx_community_standard as ds on ds.nx_CS_comm_goods_id = cg.nx_community_goods_id left join nx_community_alias as da on da.nx_CA_com_goods_id = cg.nx_community_goods_id
and nx_cg_community_id = #{commId}
and ( nx_cg_goods_name like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or nx_ca_alias_name like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%') or nx_cg_goods_pinyin like concat('%', #{searchStrPinyin}, '%') or nx_cg_goods_py like concat('%', #{searchStrPinyin}, '%') or da.nx_CA_alias_name like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%'))
and ( nx_cg_goods_pinyin like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') or nx_cg_goods_py like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%') or da.nx_CA_alias_name like concat('%', #{searchPinyin}, '%'))
order by nx_cg_goods_pinyin

select * , ncgsiGoods.nx_community_goods_set_item_id 'goods_nx_community_goods_set_item_id', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_name 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_name', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_status 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_status', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_cg_goods_id 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_cg_goods_id', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_quantity 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_quantity', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_type 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_type', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_file_path 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_file_path', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_price 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_price', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_sort 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_sort',
ncgsi.nx_community_goods_set_item_id 'p_nx_community_goods_set_item_id', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_name 'p_nx_cgsi_item_name', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_status 'p_nx_cgsi_item_status', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_cg_property_id 'p_nx_cgsi_cg_property_id', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_quantity 'p_nx_cgsi_item_quantity', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_cg_goods_id 'p_nx_cgsi_item_cg_goods_id', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_type 'p_nx_cgsi_item_type', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_file_path 'p_nx_cgsi_item_file_path', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_price 'p_nx_cgsi_item_price', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_sort 'p_nx_cgsi_item_sort',
huaxianCos.nx_community_orders_sub_id 'huaxianCos_nx_community_orders_sub_id', huaxianCos.nx_COS_community_goods_id 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_community_goods_id', huaxianCos.nx_COS_order_user_id 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_order_user_id', huaxianCos.nx_COS_status 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_status', huaxianCos.nx_COS_type 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_type', huaxianCos.nx_COS_orders_id 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_orders_id', huaxianCos.nx_COS_huaxian_different_price 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_huaxian_different_price', huaxianCos.nx_COS_huaxian_price 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_huaxian_price', huaxianCos.nx_COS_price 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_price', huaxianCos.nx_COS_quantity 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_quantity', huaxianCos.nx_COS_subtotal 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_subtotal', huaxianCos.nx_COS_remark 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_remark' from nx_community_goods as ncg left join nx_community_card as ncc on ncc.nx_community_card_id = ncg.nx_cg_card_id left join nx_community_goods_set_item as ncgsiGoods on ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_cg_goods_id = ncg.nx_community_goods_id left join nx_community_goods_set_property as ncgsp on ncgsp.nx_cgsp_cg_goods_id = ncg.nx_community_goods_id left join nx_community_goods_set_item as ncgsi on ncgsi.nx_cgsi_cg_property_id = ncgsp.nx_community_goods_set_property_id
left join nx_community_orders_sub as ncos on ncos.nx_COS_community_goods_id = ncg.nx_community_goods_id and ncos.nx_COS_order_user_id = #{orderUserId} and ncos.nx_COS_status < 2 and ncos.nx_COS_type = 0 left join nx_community_orders_sub as huaxianCos on huaxianCos.nx_COS_community_goods_id = ncg.nx_community_goods_id and huaxianCos.nx_COS_order_user_id = #{orderUserId} and huaxianCos.nx_COS_status < 2 and huaxianCos.nx_COS_type = 0
and ncg.nx_community_goods_id = #{goodsId}
order by ncgsp.nx_cgsp_sort,ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_sort,ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_sort

select * , ncgsiGoods.nx_community_goods_set_item_id 'goods_nx_community_goods_set_item_id', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_name 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_name', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_status 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_status', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_cg_goods_id 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_cg_goods_id', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_quantity 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_quantity', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_type 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_type', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_file_path 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_file_path', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_price 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_price', ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_sort 'goods_nx_cgsi_item_sort',
ncgsi.nx_community_goods_set_item_id 'p_nx_community_goods_set_item_id', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_name 'p_nx_cgsi_item_name', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_status 'p_nx_cgsi_item_status', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_cg_property_id 'p_nx_cgsi_cg_property_id', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_quantity 'p_nx_cgsi_item_quantity', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_cg_goods_id 'p_nx_cgsi_item_cg_goods_id', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_type 'p_nx_cgsi_item_type', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_file_path 'p_nx_cgsi_item_file_path', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_price 'p_nx_cgsi_item_price', ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_sort 'p_nx_cgsi_item_sort'
from nx_community_goods as ncg left join nx_community_card as ncc on ncc.nx_community_card_id = ncg.nx_cg_card_id left join nx_community_goods_set_item as ncgsiGoods on ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_cg_goods_id = ncg.nx_community_goods_id left join nx_community_goods_set_property as ncgsp on ncgsp.nx_cgsp_cg_goods_id = ncg.nx_community_goods_id left join nx_community_goods_set_item as ncgsi on ncgsi.nx_cgsi_cg_property_id = ncgsp.nx_community_goods_set_property_id
and ncg.nx_community_goods_id = #{goodsId}
order by ncgsp.nx_cgsp_sort,ncgsi.nx_cgsi_item_sort,ncgsiGoods.nx_cgsi_item_sort
mapper.delete:
delete from nx_community_goods where nx_community_goods_id in
#{nxCommunityGoodsId}
